"Yuri": "Yeah, alright! Let me lay it out for ya!"
"Rayjord Gorge is an especially cold area of Kvaris."
"They say it's caused by the cold wind of Mt. Latva sliding down and into the Gorge."
"Without the proper protection against the cold, it'll rob you of your strength until you turn into a frozen ice sculpture!"
"So, here's whatcha do about avoidin' that..."
"You walk on over to a Regional Mag for some help!"
"The Regional Mags in Kvaris are a little special, y'see."
"When you give 'em items, they give you a boost that strengthens you against the cold."
"Regional Mags are just a big mystery, ain't they? Maybe we're all just imagining them or something..."
"Anyways, why dont'cha go pay a visit to the Regional Mag in Western Kvaris? Well, go on now!"
